short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mute or unmute all tabs with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Mute All" Chrome extension allows you to quickly mute or unmute all open tabs with just one click. This lightweight tool is perfect for users who frequently have multiple tabs open and need an easy way to manage audio without manually muting each tab. Simply click the extension icon in your browser toolbar to toggle between muting and unmuting all tabs at once.
